author: Kenneth Leong
comment: Why can't I find this app on my LG watch urbane 1st Gen on Android Wear 2.0?   Update : ok no prob now, i was just stupid

author: Chris van Gorder
comment: I really liked this on my LG G Watch. Too bad it's not compatible with the LG Watch  Style.

author: victor
comment: I really like it, would be nice to be able to chance the top color part with something at your won choice and weather to be updated without phone needing to be paired. But otherwise it;s nice.

author: Max Hapner
comment: Refuses to apply changes unless GPS is enabled

author: Mason Milburn
comment: I love this watchface, but there is a bug with the weather when it comes out of ambient mode, the temperature jumps to billions of degrees. One thing I would love is if the battery could reflect my phone's battery and not my watch's battery, I don't care what my watch is at. That one change and I'll give 5 stars, thanks!
title: Battery Indicator Is Pointless

author: Rok Lipnik
comment: I like the design, the simplicity and yet the amount of information it displays. But, I've seen a bug on multiple occasions where the ambient display is stuck with seconds, battery and date info displayed. It does resolve in time, but it is strange.

author: Savell Martin
comment: Love it, looks good.  Did have a hiccup with the weather being stuck and never updating. But reinstalled it and working again :)  EDIT: Well it didnt last long, been stuck at the same temp all day again :( Sigh

author: Kareem Brooks
comment: Just please take the app out of my app drawer and let me access it through the android wear app like every other watch face I own... I'd even pay for that.
title: Love the design of this watch face

author: Harold Delaney
comment: From the looks of the watch I imeadiatly thought that it would be a great addition to my collection but once I downloaded it I couldn't access the settings every time I opened it it would fail I expected better from what looked like such a well polished looking app

reply.author: Alessandro Borelli
reply.content: Hi, I didn't find tour issue. Please send me an e-mail with your model of smartphone and smartwatch and detail of issue. Ps I will not be responsabile for any malfunction on rooted phone. Thanks

title: Doesn't work

author: Marius Haagensen
comment: Thid app is great, but I would love to be able to change the watch face, and let the weather update without using gps, but by using networks. The app requires gps to work, and it would be great if there was an option to use networks instead
title: Great app, but lacks something

author: Tori Samanie
comment: I love the look of the watch. However, the temperature changes from 60F to 140F every time the screen dims. Not sure what's going on.
title: Great!

author: Jennifer
comment: Dev added 12 hour and Fahrenheit option! On asus zenwatch 2, seconds are too close to right edge of screen.

reply.author: Alessandro Borelli
reply.content: Hi, thanks for your review! I released an update to solve the crash. It will available soon change time or temperature in the app.

title: Better!

author: Lui Yay
comment: Crashes when I boot up
title: Looks great but

author: Edward Rubio
comment: Love this design. Would love a dark theme and step counter too. Would also be nice if the designer followed the guidelines and put the settings in the wear app instead of having its own app.
title: Almost perfect

author: Ben Stanley
comment: That's all I keep getting every time I try to set this as my watch face. Very disappointing. Deleted.
title: Unfortunately material watch face stopped working

author: Jessica Lane
comment: Crashes too much..
title: Really not that cool

author: gordon smith
comment: great watchface but the temperature is always wrong currently showing 11 c when other apps show correct temp of 5c
title: poor weather

author: Jared MacKenzie
comment: Love this watch face, it's very clean I just wish we could have the phone battery indicator on screen as well.
title: Very clean

author: Marty Goetting
comment: Would be a 5 star if the bottom font was @ 1-2 px bigger, kind of hard to read at the current size for older eyes :)

author: Paul Štutas
comment: Every menu option gives an error
title: Errors

author: Luke Nelson
comment: Looks great! Just installed and I love it. It would be great to show my phone's battery percentage as well as the watch's battery.

author: K Wallace
comment: Worked great for a week then kept crashing.
title: Crashes

author: Philip LeMoyne
comment: Great face, however I'd like to be able to customize the dimmed face (remove the horizontal lines).

author: brodie Yg
comment: Love it, needs more options to add to the screen. Like calendar and stuff needs to be interactive. Needs more colour variations.
title: Love it

author: John Sinclair
comment: Simple, elegant, beautiful, informative and very low battery and processor drain.
title: Stunning

author: Jeroen Kruize
comment: Temperature doesn't update

author: Joshua Gilbert
comment: Favorite watch face so far

author: Neale Moss
comment: Works really good on the Sony SW3
title: Sony SW3

author: Benjamin Roland Vida
comment: Nice

author: 刘泽森
comment: material watch face has stop  android 5.1.1

reply.author: Alessandro Borelli
reply.content: Hi, thanks for your review! I released an update to solve the crash.

author: Daris Crittenden
comment: As title. No options for 12-hour mode or Fahrenheit for us U.S. users, I know, we aren't the world. But it's still customary to provide all common temp and time forms..... But it does LOOK great!
title: 12-hour & Fahrenheit Missing

comment: But unfortunately there's no option to change the colour, so the face just displays a day time theme. Also the weather never changes? I have a cloud at 23!
title: Easy to read, clear design

author: Dan Cross
comment: Unable to use as watch face constantly crashes when either trying to set it or access its settings.
title: Unstable

author: Adam Thomas
comment: No Fahrenheit, battery is poor using this watch face. No personalization settings at all. Uninstalling
title: Half done

author: Ryan Montgomery
comment: The settings aren't available from the Android Wear app like they're supposed to be (they're also not available on the watch). Also you're not supposed to clutter up my app drawer with an icon.
title: Nice, clean design

author: Alison Biggs
comment: Looks good. Standard settings work for me. Weather changes too.
title: Easy to look at

author: Matt Walker
comment: 5 stars if dev adds a 12 hour clock mode. Otherwise, this is perfect.
title: 12 Hour mode

author: Cadence Galbraith
comment: From a 100% charge, this watch face took my watch down to 97% in less than a minute of being on.
title: Eats my battery

author: Nicholas Riddle
comment: Has no option for Fahrenheit or regular time. Only Celsius and military time. Can't even change locations.
title: Needs options.

author: Michael Salazar
comment: TBH, this is my favorite watch face, but I had to delete because of the missing 12 hours and Fahrenheit options
title: TBH
